member.name: T:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert
member.summary: Provides assertion methods for verifying and querying the contents and structure of XML.

member.name: M:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert.AreEqual(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Asserts that the XML referenced by two given objects are equal in terms of contents and structure.
member.param: An , referencing the XML to validate.

member.name: M:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert.AreEquivalent(Jolt.Testing.Assertions.XmlComparisonFlags,System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Asserts that the XML referenced by two given objects are equivalent according to the given equivalency configuration.
member.param: A value denoting the definition of equivalency.
An , referencing the XML to validate.

member.name: M:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert.IsValid(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Asserts that the XML referenced by the given object is valid with the given schemas.
member.param: An , referencing the XML to validate.

member.name: M:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert.IsValid(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet,System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags,System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Asserts that the XML referenced by the given object is valid with the given schemas and validator configuration.
member.param: An value that configures the XML validator.
An , referencing the XML to validate.

member.name: M:Jolt.Testing.Assertions.VisualStudio.XmlAssert.ProcessValidationResult(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventArgs})
member.summary: Verifies a of for assertion validity.
